Source code for sim

"""
The sim module everything for the simulator is provided.

"""


import importlib


[docs]class Sim:
    def __init__(self, seed=1, max_round=10, solution="None"):
        """

        :param seed: seed number for new random numbers
        :param max_round: the max round number for terminating the simulator
        :param solution: The name of solution/solution that is going to be used
        """
        self.__max_round = max_round
        self.__round_counter = 1
        self.__seed=seed
        self.__solution = solution


[docs]    def get_max_round(self):
        """
        Return the initialized endding round number

        :return: The maximum round number
        """
        return self.__max_round



[docs]    def get_actual_round(self):
        """
        The actual round number

        :return: actual round number
        """
        return self.__round_counter



[docs]    def inc_round_cnter(self):
        """
        Increases the the round counter by

        :return:
        """


        self.__round_counter +=  1



[docs]    def run(self, world, solution):
        """

        :param world: The worlds object
        :param solution: The name of the solution file
        :return:
        """
        if solution is not None:
            mod = importlib.import_module('lib.solutions.'+solution.strip('.py'))
            while self.get_actual_round() <= self.get_max_round():
                mod.solution(self, world)
                world.csv_round_writer.next_line(self.get_actual_round())
                self.__round_counter = self.__round_counter + 1
            world.csv_round_writer.aggregate_metrics()  # After simulation is finished, aggregate everything
            for particle in world.particles:
                particle.csv_particle_writer.close_particle()

        else:
            print ("No solution")
